name: Island.io Survival
description:
Let us introduce you to our last game: Island.io!

Island.io is a tactical action game with a top down view set in futuristic geometric backgrounds.

Let us introduce you to our last game: Island.io! Island.io is a tactical action game with a top down view set in futuristic geometric backgrounds.

Island.io welcomes you! The objective of the game is to gain as much mass as possible by swallowing smaller cells without being swallowed by bigger ones.

HOW TO PLAY: Swipe to move a cell.

Game features:
+ action arcade game
+ minimalistic backgrounds
+ animalistic chars
+ totally free

Enjoy yourself with Island.io! It’s eat or be eaten, beat or be beaten!
